Description: Simple wheelmade kaolinite cup with straight walls and rounded base. Covered in red slip and decorated below rim with two bands of cream outlined with dark brown paint, infilled with brown horizontal wavy lines. Part of rim missing.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Faras (Nubia), Meroitic Cemetery Tomb-Group 1/906 R
Condition: incomplete - partially restored from a fragments
